DOC.brief_summary: Registry cilotax stent ( Dual drug elute stent ) implantation CAD patient
DOC.brief_title: DXR Stent ( Previous Cilotax ) Implantation Registry
DOC.criteria: Patients significant coronary artery disease receive Cilotax ( dual drug elute stent ) The patient guardian agree study protocol schedule clinical followup , provide informed , write consent , approve appropriate Institutional Review Board/Ethics Committee respective clinical site Patients mixture DESs Terminal illness life expectancy < 1 year Patients present cardiogenic shock
